question: Am I supposed to add diagrams in my logbook?
answer: Yes. Adding diagrams to your logbook is compulsory. It improves the quality of your work and ensures the completeness of your SIWES experience.

question: Can I submit my SCAF form via email?
answer: Submitting your SCAF form via email is not advisable. Please go to the ITF office closest to your workplace and submit it there.
